articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00 on Tuesday on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 He entered the hall where the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The head of the guard of honor of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues. 
					
					 Placed before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state. He, together with other visitors, paid homage to him in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the room where the orders Kim Il Sung received are on display, the mourning hall and halls that house a train coach and the car he used in his lifetime.
					
					 He then entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with other visitors, paid homage to him in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the room where the orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls that house a car, electric car, boat and train coach he used in his lifetime.
					
					 He was accompanied by commanding officers of the KPA including Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song and Jo Kyong Chol.

articles.title: National Memorial Service Starts to Commemorate 20th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Memorial Service Starts to Commemorate 20th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service is now solemnly under way in Pyongyang to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, is present.

articles.title: National Memorial Service Commemorates 20th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Memorial Service Commemorates 20th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service took place solemnly at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Tuesday, the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was present.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Hwang Pyong So and senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Also present were delegations of overseas Koreans and other compatriots, those related to the revolutionary activities of the President, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and staff members of the military attaches corps here and foreign guests.
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence.
					
					 A memorial address was made there by Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 The life of Kim Il Sung was one of the most outstanding leader for the people and the peerless great man who devoted his all to the country and its people, times and humankind, the speaker said, and went on:
					
					 From the very day he embarked on the revolutionary struggle, Kim Il Sung clarified the iron truth that independence is the lifeline of the popular masses and is what keeps the country and the nation alive, founded the Juche idea centered on the popular masses and solved all issues in Korean way in the interests of the Korean people and to suit the specific conditions of the country in the whole period of leading the revolution.
					
					 In the bloody anti-Japanese revolutionary war, he defeated the gangster-like Japanese imperialists and realized the cherished desire of national liberation. He also shattered the myth of "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists with his gifted military ideas, strategies and tactics, thus winning a historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 With his far-reaching plan for building a prosperous country, he traversed the untrodden path of building a country and battled his way against the ordeals of rehabilitation and construction, thus successfully carrying out the social revolutions of two stages. He also saw to it that socialist industrialization was realized through the great surge of Chollima, thus laying a firm foundation for building self-supporting national economy.
					
					 He devoted his all to the victory of the revolution, always thinking about the country and its people while undergoing all sorrows and hardships a man and a revolutionary could suffer for a long period since he embarked on the road of the revolution.
					
					 He was the father of the nation who embraced all Koreans loving the country and the nation with his broad magnanimity and great tolerance. He was the sun of all people whom not only leaders of political parties and heads of state and personages of many countries around the world but also those with differing ideologies and political views ardently revered and worshipped, being attracted by his noble charisma.
					
					 The President successfully accomplished the cause of building the Juche-oriented party, state and army, thus providing a powerful political and military foundation for carrying to completion the Juche revolution.
					
					 He turned the whole country into a large family with his benevolent politics and all-embracing politics, thus creating a huge flower garden of single-minded unity and harmonious whole.
					
					 He built Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, thus providing an eternal groundwork for the prosperity of all generations to come.
					
					 He gave a perfect solution to the issue of the successor to the leader, the key factor in carrying forward the revolutionary cause, thus making sure that the revolutionary traditions are carried forward just as they are. He also directed big efforts to bringing up new generations to be the successors to the revolution.
					
					 He set forth the three charters for national reunification, thus clearly indicating the way of realizing the nation's desire for reunification. He put his last signature on a historic document related to Korea's reunification, a clear indication of his lifelong dedication to the reunification of the country.
					
					 Through his energetic external activities he remarkably enhanced the international position and authority of the DPRK and performed gigantic feats for strengthening the socialist movement and winning the victory of the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 The achievements the President made by performing great feats unprecedented in the history of the nation spanning thousands of years with his profound ideas and theories, distinguished leadership ability and gigantic revolutionary practice to open up a rosy future of Juche Korea will be conveyed to posterity.
					
					 Thanks to the undying feats performed by the President, the army and people of the DPRK could overcome the unprecedented Arduous March and usher in the new era of building a thriving socialist nation and demonstrate the dignity and might of Songun Korea all over the world under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche started and led to victory by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being given steady continuity by the WPK today.
					
					 As there is the leadership of the great party, all lifetime plans and desires of the President will come true and Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea will prosper forever.
					
					 Memorial services and meetings also took place in provinces, cities (districts), counties and industrial complexes to commemorate the anniversary on the same day.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Bashar al-Assad, president of Syria, on July 6.
					 The president said in the message he offered this message to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the DPRK.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 We are sharing the sincerest feelings with Your Excellency while looking back with solemnity on the day when HE President Kim Il Sung passed away.
					
					 We express the belief that Your Excellency would always maintain the line of the Korean revolution set forth by President Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader, for the party, revolution, country, people and the global cause of independence.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of Uganda, on July 4.
					 The message highly praised the noble life and feats of President Kim Il Sung who devoted himself to the Korean people and the world peoples on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his untimely and sorrowful demise.
					
					 It also said that the President devoted all his great life to making the great politico-economic and social development of the DPRK.
					
					 It said that his feats would be immortal.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of Liberal Democratic Party of Russia
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a message from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, on July 8.
					 The chairman in the message said he express sincere and noble reverence for President Kim Il Sung, an outstanding statesman and state activist, on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is always alive in the world history as an outstanding leader who left clear traces in the international political arena in the 20th century.
					
					 We, the successors to the Russia-DPRK friendship provided by him while leading the DPRK, are making efforts to strengthen this friendship in all fields of mutual cooperation.
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
					
					 I wish you success in your party and state activities for the wellbeing of the Korean people.
					
					 Please accept my regards.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from National Leader of Workers' Party of Mexico
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a message from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on July 1.
					 The message said:
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
					
					 I have the honor of extending the greatest regards to Comrade Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, on behalf of all members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 I express belief that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people would glorify forever the revolutionary idea and feats of Comrade Kim Il Sung and win the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun under your wise leadership.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you great successes in your noble work to lead the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and overseas compatriots visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Tuesday, the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung to pay homage to the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches of foreign embassies here, families of overseas Koreans related to the revolutionary activities of the President, a delegation of Koreans in Japan and a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China.
					
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The visitors made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 On the same day, the chief and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Service personnel and people visited statues of President Kim Il Sung in different parts of the country on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute to them in deep reverence.
					
					 Seen standing before the statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions at all levels, industrial establishments, farms and schools in Pyongyang as well as bouquets and flowers.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front was also laid before the statues.
					
					 The visitors made bows towards the statues of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 An endless stream of people from all walks of life with the strong yearnings for the peerless great men flowed to the statues of the President and Kim Jong Il and portraits of the smiling leaders in different parts of Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 Floral baskets were laid before the statues and portraits in the name of units of the Korean People's Army, organs, industrial establishments, farms and schools as well as bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children in various parts of the country visited the statues and portraits in their residential areas and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from International Organization, Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from  International Organization, Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill by the Women's International Democratic Federation and the Switzerland-Korea Committee on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Tuesday.
					
					 A floral basket sent by the president of the federation was laid before the statues on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Foreign Guests
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Foreign Guests
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Nigerian embassy and the UNICEF here laid floral baskets and delegations of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the International Committee of the Red Cross working in the DPRK a floral basket in their joint name before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday, the 20th anniversary of the President's demise, and paid tribute to them.
					 A delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan also visited the statues to pay tribute to them on the same day.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday, the greatest national mourning day, and paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Seen standing before the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also seen standing before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Placed before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 They entered the halls where the Generalissimos lie in state and made bow to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Army and People of DPRK Commemorate Greatest National Mourning Day
articles.content:
Army and People of DPRK Commemorate Greatest National Mourning Day
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK commemorated the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung (July 8, 1994).
					 On the greatest national mourning day, an endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life, school youth and children flowed to the statues of the President and portraits of smiling President in Pyongyang and other parts of the country.
					
					 People laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of the President and paid highest tribute to him.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children entered the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the supreme temple of Juche, and made bows toward the portraits of smiling Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Memorial services and meetings took place in provinces, cities (districts), counties and industrial complexes to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the President's demise on the same day.
					
					 All party members, service personnel and other people observed a moment's silence in memory of the President.
					
					 Revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was staged at the National Theatre here.
					
					 Remembrance concerts were given in provinces including South and North Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Jagang, North and South Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 Remembrance concerts were also given by members of shock brigades in the project sites of the power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River and the stockbreeding base in the Sepho tableland.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the immortal feats of the President.

articles.title: Revolutionary Drama Staged Here
articles.content:
Revolutionary Drama Staged Here
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Revolutionary drama "Following the Banner of Victory" was put on the  stage at the National Theatre on Tuesday, the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Watching the revolutionary drama were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, officials of the armed forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, those working in Pyongyang, heroes, those who had the honor of being received by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and labor innovators.
					
					 Invited to enjoy the drama were overseas Koreans, the chief the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations, military attaches here and their spouses and foreign guests.
					
					 The drama is a masterpiece which successfully applies the theory on depicting the leader of the working class and the theory of creating Mountain Shrine-style revolutionary dramas originally indicated by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The drama deals with the feats Kim Il Sung performed by frustrating the U.S. imperialists' large-scale "new offensive" in the eastern sector of the front with his Juche-oriented strategies, war methods and original leadership art during the Fatherland Liberation War and his noble popular personality.
					
					 Watching the drama, the audience keenly realized that the President was a great banner of victory and eternal sun of the nation as he beat down the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces in the war and led the war to a shining victory.
					
					 The drama deeply impressed the audience as it made a wide-ranging representation of the revolutionary exploits of the President on the basis of historical facts and dealt with his personality as a great man truthfully and philosophically.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in North Phyongan Province
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Farming in North Phyongan Province
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of farming at the Chimhyang Co-op Farm in Jongju City and the Unha Co-op Farm in Unjon County of North Phyongan Province.
					 The premier organized a consultative meeting after looking round several places of the farms.
					
					 The consultative meeting referred to the issues of firmly establishing a food production cycle of organically combining agriculture and stock-breeding to raise the fertility of soil, and dynamically conducting the drive to combat drought.
					
					 It stressed the need to do farming in a scientific and technological way by widely introducing advanced agricultural techniques and methods to raise the utility rate of soil. 
					
					 Earlier, the premier looked round the Sinuiju Chemical Fibre Mill where he discussed the ways for putting the production of chemical goods on a normal basis.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Personality Moves World People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Personality Moves World People
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had shown great magnanimity even for foreigners with shameful career. That's why they deeply revered him as their teacher and as an elder statesman.
					 Among them was Yoshiko Otaka, member of the House of Councilors of Japan, who visited the DPRK in July Juche 64 (1975) for the first time as a member of the Japanese delegation of influential lawmakers from the Liberal Democratic Party.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung met the delegation for hours and arranged a dinner for it. During the dinner, he said there should be songs and dances in human life, thus calming down Yoshiko Otaka who was at a loss what to do because she engaged herself in comforting the Japanese aggression army in Korea and Manchuria when young. 
					
					 She was moved to tears by such broad-minded magnanimity of the President holding the present more important than the past.
					
					 Later, Yoshiko Otaka wrote in her memoirs that she had neither met nor heard of such leader as Kim Il Sung with broad-minded magnanimity and noble personality and that he was the peerlessly great man revered by the world. 
					
					 Sin Kanemaru, former vice-president of the Liberal-Democratic Party of Japan, was one of those foreign statesmen who got enchanted by Kim Il Sung's personality when meeting with him in Pyongyang.
					
					 After returning home from Pyongyang, Sin Kanemaru told reporters: It was a very impressive visit, though so belatedly. I dare say that I was moved to tears by President Kim Il Sung's personality. I will do my best to repay him for his trust, and this is my last mission as a statesman.
					
					 As seen above, Kim Il Sung was the great sun embracing all people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Elder Statesman Recognized Worldwide
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Elder Statesman Recognized Worldwide
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- It has been 20 years since President Kim Il Sung passed away on July 8, Juche 83 (1994).
					 Kim Il Sung was a world-recognized prominent leader and a great elder statesman in the 20th century.
					
					 In his lifetime, he met with a total of 70,000 foreigners in 136 countries to make contributions to the cause of global independence.  During his foreign trips alone, he met 120 heads of state on 1,982 occasions, 206 party leaders on 2,236 occasions and 76 heads of government on 833 occasions.
					
					 After Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he had paid official and unofficial visits to 87 countries on 54 occasions and in 685 days, which covered over 522,460 kilometers.
					
					 The President fathered the immortal Juche idea and authored more than 10,800 works to show the road for the Korean people and the world progressives to follow.
					
					 He won 180-odd highest orders and medals from at least 70 countries and international bodies, honorary citizenships from 30-odd cities and the titles of honorary professor and doctor from 20 celebrated universities in the world. He also received 165,920 pieces of presents from party, state and government leaders and personages in 169 countries and compatriots overseas and in south Korea.
					
					 The world progressives are still conferring orders, medals and honorary titles on the President while presenting many gifts to him.
					
					 The immortal feats of Kim Il Sung will be remembered forever and his glorious history will continue along with the prosperity of Songun Korea.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Always Finds Himself among People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Always Finds Himself among People
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime always found himself among people in carrying on the revolution, regarding "Believing in people as in Heaven" as his motto.
					 Soon after the liberation of Korea from the Japanese colonial rule, Kim Il Sung visited Taedong County, South Phyongan Province and other rural areas and sat knee to knee with peasants to fathom the centuries-old aspiration of the peasantry for land. Through those visits, he elaborated the plan for the agrarian reform including the objects of confiscation and ways of confiscating and distributing land. Thanks to his efforts, the Agrarian Reform Law was promulgated and brought into practice in northern half of Korea.
					
					 He also set forth several political and economic lines including the line of building self-supporting national economy and the basic line of socialist economic construction, all of them drafted during his field guidance to factories, enterprises and rural and sea villages.
					
					 He had always regarded it as an iron rule to fully meet the demand, interests and desire of people in drawing up every line and policy.
					
					 His sincere devotion to the wellbeing and happiness of the people encouraged them to turn out in the struggle for building a socialist power, which has turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist country, independent in politics, self-sufficient in economy and self-reliant in defence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Is Revered by World Progressives
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Is Revered by World Progressives
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Two decades have passed since President Kim Il Sung passed away. 
					 Since the very day when the sad news came like a bolt from the blue, Kim Il Sung, prominent great man, has been boundlessly revered by the world progressives decades after decades. 
					
					 In July 20 years ago the world people deeply mourned his demise together with the Korean people. 
					
					 More than 230 heads of state and government and political party leaders, thousands of delegations and organizations and personages of different social standings of many countries paid condolatory visits to the DPRK missions. 
					
					 Governments, political parties, organizations and figures of 160 odd countries and international and regional bodies sent at least 3 300 wreaths and 3 480 messages of condolences to the bier of the President, his statue on Mansu Hill and DPRK missions. 
					
					 Memorial services were solemnly held in more than 160 countries for 10-odd days of mourning. 
					
					 World progressives' yearning for the peerless great man grew as the days went by. 
					
					 The International Kim Il Sung Foundation was established in Pyongyang in October, 2007 amid great concern of the Korean people and other progressives of the world. 
					
					 An economic college in Havana, Cuba was named after Kim Il Sung, a street in Cambodia became Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Street and another street in Syria Kim Il Sung Street. 
					
					 A reading-room of Comrade Kim Il Sung was arranged in Yuwen Middle School in Jilin of China and Kim Il Sung Library was created in Bulgaria. 
					
					 The All-Russian Society for the Study and Dissemination of Kimilsungism, the then Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism and other organizations for the study of the Juche idea and the Songun idea named after Kim Il Sung were formed in a broad scale. 
					
					 Chinese friends saw to it that a wax replica of the President who is immortal in the hearts of progressive mankind was placed with courtesy at the International Friendship Exhibition House. 
					
					 The then Mexican Friend Union for Honoring the Memory of President Kim Il Sung created badges remembering him and awarded them to its members. 
					
					 Different countries and regions of the world awarded high titles to the President in praise of his immortal exploits. 
					
					 Kimilsungia exhibitions have been grandly held every year and the immortal flower Kimilsungia was awarded special prizes and top prizes in the world flower festivals one after another. 
					
					 At least 60 remembrance committees were formed this year alone. More than 1 000 remembrance committees were formed in different parts of the five continents for the past two decades. 
					
					 About 20 000 events such as remembrance meetings, round-table talks, lectures, photo and book exhibitions, film shows for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of the great man were held in at least 170 countries and regions under the sponsorship of the remembrance committees.

articles.title: Basic Principle for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Basic Principle for Korea's Reunification
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The government of the DPRK in a statement on July 7 declared that the north and the south should settle all issues by the concerted efforts of Koreans, rejecting dependence on foreign forces.
					 The principle of independence is the basic one for national reunification which the north and the south promised to adhere to before the nation reflecting the desire and wishes of all fellow countrymen.
					
					 This principle calls for resolving all issues, big and small,  arising in the inter-Korean relations such as the one of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans without depending on foreign forces and free from foreign interference from the standpoint of attaching importance to the nation and giving priority to it.
					
					 It is the Koreans who are vitally interested in the issue of national reunification, the matter of achieving the national unity by rejoining the severed blood ties of the nation split by foreign forces and of establishing the national sovereignty throughout Korea. It is also the Koreans who are capable of doing so.
					
					 The issue of reunification related to the national sovereignty should not be left to foreign forces to settle it. Their meddling in the issue would only create complexities in it.
					
					 Foreign forces can never speak for the desire of the Korean nation for the reunification and its interests.
					
					 It is crystal clear to all that foreign forces do not wish Korea to be reunified as they partitioned it into two in pursuance of their aggressive purpose and interests.
					
					 The north and the south should never fall victim to foreign forces keen on fishing in troubled waters by keeping Korea partitioned.
					
					 It is the only right way of achieving national reunification to attach importance to the nation, strictly rely on the nation and adhere to the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The north and the south must solve all issues in the idea of By Our Nation Itself from the standpoint of giving priority to the nation and attaching importance to it and achieving the national unity in the common interests of the nation.
					
					 Such practices as peddling the internal affair of the nation in foreign countries, imploring for their "support" and begging for "sanctions" and "cooperation" against the DPRK in a bid to do harm to compatriots are nothing but shameful sycophantic and treacherous acts as they allow the destiny of the nation to be a plaything of foreign forces.
					
					 It is necessary not to allow foreign forces' unreasonable interference in the internal affair of Korea and for the north and the south to jointly counter it. This is the genuine way of applying the principle of independence and the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 There is nothing insolvable when the Koreans reject foreign forces on the principle of independence and pool their efforts.
					
					 All "assertions" and "declarations" contrary to the principle of independence should be retracted and all cooperative mechanisms infringing upon the interests of the fellow countrymen should be dismantled. These are the historic tasks to be fulfilled to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how complicated the situation may remain, the basic principle of national reunification -- the principle of independence and the idea of By Our Nation Itself -- can never change.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should wage a more dynamic patriotic struggle to bring earlier the independent reunification of the nation by pooling efforts in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Shaking U.S. Domination System
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Shaking U.S. Domination System
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign media including Kyodo News recently reported that the U.S. is pressurizing south Korea not to take part in the establishment of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) being pushed forward by China and other Asian countries.
					 According to it, in June last Washington objected to south Korea's participation in the establishment of the AIIB, even warning that it would have an adverse impact on the bilateral relations. 
					
					 It also asserted that the AIIB would not display the same efficiency as the one of the U.S.-led Asian Development Bank (ADB).
					
					 This indicates that the U.S., much upset by its daily worsening systems of aggression for world domination, is obstructing the development of China overtly and covertly.
					
					 The U.S. set China as its potential rival and has intensified the offensive for its domination over the latter and the rest of Asia-Pacific.
					
					 It is the calculation of Washington to plug south Korea and other countries kowtowing to it into its alliance in a bid to have them at its beck and call and use them as a shock brigade for executing a war of aggression in contingency. 
					
					 It is against this backdrop that China initiated the establishment of the investment bank and many countries welcomed it.
					
					 This cannot but be a blow to the U.S. which has established monetary and financial domination over the region by use of such an economic lever as the ADB.
					
					 Notably, the interest shown even by south Korea in the establishment of the bank may reduce the seriously unstable alliance of the U.S. to a mere name. 
					
					 The above-said pressure put by the U.S. upon its junior ally was prompted by its difficult position. Commenting on this, foreign media noted that south Korea is finding itself in a more awkward position as it has to read the face of both the U.S. and China.
					
					 It has become an irresistible trend of times at present to advance toward multi-polarization against the U.S. brigandish unipolar domination system.
					
					 Despite the vicious obstructive moves of the U.S. the number of countries and regions joining in the establishment of the bank is on the steady increase and they are stepping up preparations including the accumulation of funds after setting it as their goal to open the bank at the end of 2014 or early in 2015.
					
					 Commenting on it, Ta Kung Pao, a newspaper in Hong Kong, China, and other foreign media reported that the establishment of the AIIB in the pipeline is to cope with the domination system including the ADB led by the U.S. and Japan. 
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that once the new bank officially starts its business, the black tentacles stretched out by the U.S. to the region will prove all the more incompetent and the conflict between China and the U.S. will further fester.
					
					 As seen above, infrastructures of the U.S. aimed at world domination are shaking to their very foundation.
					
					 The U.S. should face up to the present era in which no nation allows domination and subjugation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Il Sung's Exploits for National Reunification
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The history of President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary leadership was a great one in which he dedicated his all to one Korea, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Under the critical situation where the 38th Parallel divided Korea into two parts and the north and the south were taking completely different paths after its liberation, Kim Il Sung made a scientific clarification of the root cause of the country's division and the essence of the issue of national reunification.
					
					 He provided the three charters for national reunification, thus laying a solid foundation for enabling all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to put an end to the interference of outsiders and hasten the independent reunification of the country as a driving force for national reunification.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership, the historic July 4 joint statement was finally published in Pyongyang and Seoul on July 4, Juche 61 (1972) simultaneously, the keynote of which was the three principles of national reunification. This was fully supported and hailed by the public at home and abroad.
					
					 He confirmed that the mode of achieving reunification by federal formula of our style was to establish the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo on the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
					
					 The ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation set forth by him is a political programme which should be certainly taken as the guidelines for strengthening the driving force of national reunification by achieving the unity of all Koreans.
					
					 The undying exploits he performed by rallying all Koreans under the banner of the great  national unity and developing the movement for the country's reunification into a nation-wide patriotic struggle will shine long along with the history of the nation.

articles.title: 20th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by DPRK's Papers
articles.content:
20th Anniversary of Demise of Kim Il Sung Commemorated by DPRK's Papers
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Twenty years have passed since President Kim Il Sung passed away.
					 Papers in their editorials Tuesday say that the past twenty years were unforgettable days when the personality of the President as the peerless great man was more keenly felt by the Korean people, all compatriots and progressive humankind, and when the validity and invincibility of his idea and cause were more powerfully displayed.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the august name and image of the President are shining more brilliantly day after day as he performed the great exploits by ushering in the era of Juche, the new era of history, and guiding it to the brilliant victory.
					
					 The paper goes on;
					
					 The President is always alive along with the Juche idea, the immortal revolutionary idea, which brightly illuminates the road ahead of the Korean people and humankind, and the eternal foundation that provides a sure guarantee for the rosy future of the country and the nation.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the state and the army were founded by the President and Korean-style socialist system, the most advantageous social system in the world, was also built by him and the revolutionary tradition of Songun, the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, single-minded unity and self-supporting economy are the precious revolutionary legacies left by him.
					
					 The powerful political, ideological, military and economic foundations provided by the President with much effort, looking far into the future, were the source of strength with which the army and people of the DPRK could weather difficulties and trials.
					
					 He is always alive as he has the unbreakable close bonds of kinship with the Korean people. The army and people of the DPRK made the revolution under the leadership of the President, the greatest fortune and honor bestowed upon them.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of perpetuating the memory of the President pioneered and the noble tradition of which was provided by leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un on a more noble ground.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that the august name and benevolent image of the President are the symbols of the dignity of the great Paektusan nation and the banner of all victories and glory, and his idea and exploits are the precious eternal treasure which can not be bartered for anything as they guarantee the victorious advance of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: General Association of Koreans in China Backs Special Proposal of DPRK
articles.content:
General Association of Koreans in China Backs Special Proposal of DPRK
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China on July 2 issued a statement calling upon the south Korean authorities to put an end to distrust and confrontation in hearty response to the proposal of the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the association fully supports the special proposal of the DPRK as a just patriotic one for national reunification reflecting the desire of all fellow countrymen for the nation's security, peace and prosperity and the requirement of the times.
					
					 The statement demanded the south Korean authorities stop the far-fetched assertion beyond common sense that their largest-ever war drills aimed at "capturing Pyongyang" are "annual" and "defensive".
					
					 It also urged the authorities to halt all their military hostile acts against fellow countrymen.
					
					 It also called upon the north and the south to jointly mark the anniversaries of the July 4 joint statement and the October 4 declaration which shine in the history of struggle for accomplishing the sacred cause of national reunification, remove misunderstanding and distrust and open a new phase for reconciliation and unity through sincere dialogue.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Overseas Koreans strongly demand the south Korean authorities positively respond to the bold decision and sincere special proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will turn out in the nationwide struggle for translating into reality the patriotic reunification proposal advanced by the DPRK to reject war and pave the road to improving the inter-Korean ties from the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: 18th Meeting of Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Held
articles.content:
18th Meeting of Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan Held
Tokyo, July 7 (KNS-KCNA) -- The 18th meeting of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan was held in Matsumoto City, Nagano Prefecture, Japan on July 5.
					 Present there were Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), O Min Hak, director of the Economic Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Kim Thae Ryong, chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, Ri Kwang Sang, chairman of the Nagano Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, Jong Won Hae, chairman of the Commercial Association in Nagano Prefecture, officials and members of the  Korean Youth Commercial Association across Japan.
					
					 The meeting heard a congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the 23rd Congress of Chongryon.
					
					 Vice-chairman Pak Ku Ho made an address.
					
					 The association is reliably carrying forward the tradition of the patriotic movement, he said.
					
					 He called for more thoroughly and dynamically carrying out the decision of the 23rd Congress of Chongryon, true to the congratulatory message of Kim Jong Un.  
					
					 Chairman Kim Thae Ryong made a report.
					
					 He said that during its 17th-term the association has made a great contribution to the development of national education and consolidated the organizations in all areas of Japan, playing a major role in the patriotic movement.
					
					 The target of the 18th-term work is to make the association take on full appearance as a dynamic youth organization and economic organization suited to the new era and changed working conditions, he noted.
					
					 He proposed the tasks to be fulfilled to significantly greet the 60th anniversary of Chongryon and the 20th anniversary of the association.
					
					 The chairpersons of the branches of the association across Japan made speeches.
					
					 Kim Thae Ryong was reelected chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan.

articles.title: Mosaics Depicting Portraits, Images of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Different Units
articles.content:
Mosaics Depicting Portraits, Images of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Different Units
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Mosaics depicting portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their images were erected in different units.
					 Mosaics "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us" and "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Will Always Be with Us" were built in Sohung, Jangphung and Hwangju counties of North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il visited Sohung County several times, indicating the way to be followed by it and taking warm care of the living of its people.
					
					 Providing field guidance to Jangphung County several times, they gave teachings that it should make good use of mountains and conduct irrigation projects to improve the standard of the people's living.
					
					 Their dedication to agricultural production and development of local industry is associated with various places of Hwangju County including Kindung Plain.
					
					 Anbyon and Kumgang counties and the Unryul Mine are also associated with the benevolence shown by them who turned counties into places good to live in and led the workers of the mine.
					
					 Erected at the Kangso Coal Mine are mosaics "Mounting Mt. Paektu" depicting the beaming images of them looking far into the bright future of Juche Korea on Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 Ceremonies for the completion of the mosaics were held at the relevant units.

articles.title: Int'l United Confederation of Koreans Issues Magazine
articles.content:
Int'l United Confederation of Koreans Issues Magazine
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans issued the June issue of its monthly socio-political magazine Thongil.
					 The magazine conveys news that supreme leader Kim Jong Un attended a national meeting held to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Seen in the magazine is the news that Kim Jong Un inspected KPA Naval Unit 167 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					
					 Given in the magazine is a message of greeting he sent to the president of the Russian Federation on the occasion of its national day.
					
					 It dedicates an article titled "Kim Jong Il and immortal exploits performed by him in the party building" to the 50th anniversary of his start of work at the C.C., the WPK, which praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into an invincible party which firmly established the monolithic leadership system.
					
					 On the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration the magazine carries articles titled "The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration serves as a permanent banner for the movement for national reunification" and "June 15 era reflects the wishes of the whole Korean nation." They recalled that the fundamental changes occurred in the inter-Korean relations in the wake of the historic north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of division, and the June 15 era.
					
					 It carries an article titled "Korean war, data speaks" as regards the outbreak of the June 25 Korean war.
					
					 It introduces the international news including a report about the 6th meeting of the inter-governmental committee for cooperation in trade, economy, science and technology between the DPRK and the Russian Federation held in Vladivostok, Russia.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Biography Carried by Austrian Organization on Its Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Biography Carried by Austrian Organization on Its Bulletin
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna carried the biography of President Kim Il Sung in its bulletin on July 2. 
					 The bulletin carried the portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Reading-sessions, round-table talks, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in the period from June 23 to July 1 at the Angolan Shipbuilding Yard, Gabriel Hospital and Araya Dental Hospital of Ethiopia,  Addis Ababa Youth Association, Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, Franonson Mannyon International Company Ltd. of Nigeria and the Romanian Workers' Association. 
					
					 On display in the venues of the photo and book exhibitions were photos documenting the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 Films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea". 
					
					 The department director of technology of the Angolan Shipbuilding Yard said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the eternal leader of not only the Korean people but also other progressives in the world. 
					
					 The President rendered selfless aid to the Angolan people in the struggle for national liberation and the building of a new society. 
					
					 His immortal exploits are kept in the minds of the Angolan people. 
					
					 The vice-directors of the Gabriel Hospital and Araya Dental Hospital of Ethiopia said that the exploits the President performed for the global cause of independence will be immortal and praised him as the great statesman recognized by the world. 
					
					 The director of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea said the President's life is the one of the great leader who made a great contribution to the cause of human liberation under the banner of independence against imperialism and the life devoted to the people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering President Kim Il Sung took place in Russia, Czech Republic, Benin and Indonesia in the period from June 19 to 27. 
					 The chairman of the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region said that Kim Il Sung was the great leader of the Korean people who devoted all his life to them. 
					
					 The exploits he performed for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence will be kept forever in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives, he added. 
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association noted that the Korean people could build a prosperous socialist power despite the persistent moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK. It is attributable to the wise leadership of the President, he added. 
					
					 The president of the Socialist Party of Benin said heads of political parties and state and people from all walks of life of many countries highly praise Kim Il Sung because his idea is great and his personality is prominent, adding that his benevolent image will be kept forever in the hearts of the progressives as the most precious one. 
					
					 The section chief for foreign relations of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle said that Kim Il Sung was the great leader who achieved the liberation of the Korean nation and defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country from the U.S. aggression.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Guinea, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded by Personages of Guinea, Myanmar
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Guinean and Myanmar personages made public statements on June 26 and 30 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the President was the great leader who performed undying exploits for the people's happiness, prosperity of the country and the sacred cause for global independence. 
					
					 The President is boundlessly revered as the most prominent great man who glorified the 20th century as a century of independence and he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and the world progressives, he added. 
					
					 The general director of a publishing house in Myanmar paid highest tribute to Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people. He went on:
					
					 We recollect with deep emotion that Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation, built powerful socialist Korea and performed undying exploits for happiness and prosperity of the Korean people and the sacred cause of global independence.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the Korean people have become the most dignified and independent people in the world and the DPRK has turned into an invincible socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Germany
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Three Principles of National Reunification" was published in booklet by a publishing house in Berlin of Germany. 
					 The work published on May 3 and November 3, Juche 61(1972) clarifies the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--and the idea of realizing the north-south cooperation. 
					
					 The preface of the booklet said:
					
					 The work of the President is specially brought out to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise. 
					
					 The President in his lifetime put forward a lot of proposals for the reunification of Korea and performed the great exploits for the cause of the Korean people for national reunification. 
					
					 This work is published to convey long the immortal exploits of the President for the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on July 2.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Czech Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Czech Political Party on Its Website
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Hold the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung in High Esteem as Eternal President of Our Republic" was posted by the Czechoslovak Communist Party on its website on July 1. 
					 The work published on July 11 and 19, Juche 83 (1994) stresses the need to uphold President Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages and indicates the tasks for preserving and successfully inheriting and developing his idea and exploits. 
					
					 The website carried the portrait of the smiling President.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Nigerian Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on July 2. 
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to firmly defend their ideas and feats and add eternal brilliance to them.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held Abroad
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in India, Bulgaria and Guinea on July 2 and 3 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise. 
					 On display at the venues of the seminars were photos documenting exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and other photos and books introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, said:
					
					 Though the President passed away, he is praised by the world progressive people as the eternal leader and father. 
					
					 The President was, indeed, not only the leader of the country but the father who took care of the life and destiny of the people in a responsible manner. 
					
					 Footsteps taken by him who provided ceaseless field guidance to bring a happy life to the people are recorded in every nook and corner of the DPRK. 
					
					 Dinko Zhelev, head of the Organizational Department of the National Council of the Bulgarian Socialist Party, Milcho Gyuvrov, vice-chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association, and other personages praised the sacred revolutionary career of the President. 
					
					 They stressed that the President is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives for his great exploits.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that the President's life was the brilliant one as he devoted everything to the country and its people and the global cause of independence. 
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Special Proposal of NDC of DPRK Favored by Romanian Political Figure
articles.content:
Special Proposal of NDC of DPRK Favored by Romanian Political Figure
Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, issued a statement on July 1 in support of the special proposal sent by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK to the south Korean authorities.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The NDC of the DPRK sent a special proposal reflecting the principled stand for ensuring durable peace on the Korean peninsula to the south Korean authorities on June 30.
					
					 This is an intensive expression of the peace-loving stand of the DPRK to open a new turning phase of improving the inter-Korean relations by holding fast to the three principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity and in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself as desired by the Korean nation.
					
					 The party fully supports the special proposal and calls upon the world progressives to positively conduct the solidarity movement for supporting it.
					
					 It also strongly demands the south Korean authorities stop seeking the confrontation with fellow countrymen while resorting to the dangerous provocative moves in collusion with foreign forces, halt all war drills at once and positively respond to the patriotic proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 All the party members hope the Korean people would make greater successes in the struggle to ensure the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and achieve the national reunification under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to President Kim Il Sung's noble idea and desire for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 20º aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejército Popular de Corea, visitó a la hora 0 del día 8 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Entró en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie de los Generalísimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aéreas y antiaéreas del EPC y del Ejército Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio el parte de recepción hacia las estatuas.
					
					Seguidamente, fueron colocados al pie de ellas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del EPC.
					
					Junto con los participantes en la ceremonia de homenaje, el Mariscal rindió homenaje a los Generalísimos ante sus estatuas.
					
					A continuación, entró en el salón de eternidad donde está conservado el cuerpo del Generalísimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					Volvió a rendirle homenaje junto con los participantes y recorrió el hall de llantos y las salas de conservación de las órdenes, el vagón de tren y el carro, usados por el Presidente.
					
					En el salón de eternidad donde está conservado el cuerpo del Generalísimo Kim Jong Il, el Mariscal le rindió tributo junto con los participantes y pasó revista a las salas de conservación de las órdenes, el carro, el coche eléctrico, el barco y el vagón de tren usados por el Dirigente.
					
					Le acompañaron en esta ocasión Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y otros comandantes del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de dirigente nacional de PTM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de dirigente nacional de PTM
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia primero Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico y miembro del Congreso de la Union. 
					La misiva senala que en ocasion del 20o aniversario del fallecimiento del eterno Presidente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Kim Il Sung, tiene el honor de rendirle el maximo homenaje en nombre de todos los militantes del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico y en el suyo propio. 
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal, el PTC y el pueblo coreanos glorifiquen eternamente la idea revolucionaria y las hazanas del Presidente y logren la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la del Songun. 
					
					Aprovechando la oportunidad, desea de todo corazon grandes exitos en el noble trabajo del Mariscal quien conduce la lucha del PTC y del pueblo coreano por construir un Estado prospero socialista y reunificar el pais de manera independiente y por via pacifica.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de personalidad de Dinamarca
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de personalidad de Dinamarca
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dedicara el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Dinamarca-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Anders Kristensen, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo traslado el dia 7 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente ugandes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente ugandes
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje que le enviara el dia 4 el presidente de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni.
					El texto va como sigue: 
					
					En ocasion del 20o aniversario del deceso tan temprano y tan doloroso de Su Excelencia Kim Il Sung, gran lider, elogio altamente la noble vida y las hazanas del gran Lider por el pueblo coreano y los demas del mundo. 
					
					El gran Lider dedico su vida brillante para que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea lograra gran desarrollo politico, economico y social. 
					
					Seran eternas sus proezas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente de PDL de Rusia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente de PDL de Rusia
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio el dia 8 un mensaje que le enviara el presidente del Partido Democratico Liberal de Rusia, V. V. Zhirinovsky.
					La misiva senala: 
					
					Estimado companero Kim Jong Un, 
					
					En ocasion del 20o aniversario del fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quisiera transmitir a Vd. mi sincera y noble veneracion a este destacado politico y activista estatal. 
					
					El Generalisimo Kim Il Sung vive para siempre en la historia mundial como destacado lider que dejo notables huellas en la palestra politica internacional del siglo 20.
					
					Nosotros, continuadores de la amistad Rusia-Corea, preparada en aquellos dias en que el conducia la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hacemos esfuerzos por fortalecer y desarrollar esos lazos en todos los dominios de cooperacion reciproca. 
					
					Estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, 
					
					Deseo a Vd. exitos en sus actividades partidistas y estatales para el bienestar del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideracion.

articles.title: Premier coreano averigua asuntos agricolas de provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Premier coreano averigua asuntos agricolas de provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno las gestiones de la Granja Cooperativa de Chimhyang de la ciudad de Jongju y la de Unha del distrito de Unjon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Tras recorrer varios puntos de las granjas, convoco las reuniones de consulta.
					
					En las ocasiones, Pak asigno la tarea de mejorar la fertilidad de la tierra al establecer perfectamente el ciclo de produccion agricultura-ganaderia y dinamizar el combate a la sequia.
					
					Dio enfasis en los problemas para la agricultura cientifico-tecnica tales como elevar el rendimiento de la tierra al aplicar ampliamente avanzadas tecnologias como cultivo doble.
					
					Anteriormente, el premier visito la Fabrica de Fibras Quimicas de Sinuiju donde debatio los remedios para normalizar la produccion de productos quimicos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Kim Il Sung por reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun enumera proezas de Kim Il Sung por reunificacion de patria
Pyongyang, 8 de julio (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que la historia de direccion revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung fue la gran vida en que dedico todo lo suyo por la reunificacion de Corea. 
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, cuando el Norte y el Sur de Corea se dividieron en dos partes por el paralelo 38o y se dirigian al camino contrario, el Presidente explico la causa de la division nacional y dio la respuesta cientifica a la esencia del problema de reunificacion del pais. 
					
					Al preparar las Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria, asento la firme base para que la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar, siendo sujeto de la reunificacion,  pudiera acabar con la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y adelantar la reunificacion independiente del pais. 
					
					Gracias a la energica guia del Presidente, el 4 de julio del 61 (1972) de la Era Juche fue publicada a la vez en Pyongyang y Seul la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio basada en los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, lo que acaparo gran apoyo y aplausos del interior y exterior del pais. 
					
					El Presidente determino que el modo de reunificacion segun el sistema federal es fundar la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo basandose en los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion: la independencia, la reunificacion pacifica y la gran unidad nacional. 
					
					El Programa de diez puntos de la gran unidad pannacional para la reunificacion de la patria, presentado por el Presidente, es el programa politico a tomarse como guia en fortalecer las fuerzas autoctonas de la reunificacion mediante la unidad de toda la nacion. 
					
					Seran eternas junto con la historia nacional las proezas del Presidente quien agrupo a toda la nacion bajo la bandera de la gran unidad nacional y desarrollo el movimiento por la reintegracion territorial del pais como una lucha patriotica pannacional.
